STATEMENT.name: LIST_THRESHOLD
STATEMENT.query: SELECT threshold_id as id, name, description FROM sbi_threshold

STATEMENT.name: DETAIL_THRESHOLD
STATEMENT.query: SELECT THRESHOLD_ID as id, name, description, THRESHOLD_TYPE_ID FROM sbi_threshold WHERE THRESHOLD_ID = ?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_THRESHOLD
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE sbi_threshold SET name=?, description=?, THRESHOLD_TYPE_ID=? WHERE THRESHOLD_ID=?

STATEMENT.name: INSERT_THRESHOLD
STATEMENT.query: INSERT INTO sbi_threshold(name, description, THRESHOLD_TYPE_ID) VALUES (?,?,?);

STATEMENT.name: LIST_THRESHOLD_VALUES
STATEMENT.query: SELECT id_threshold_value as id, position, label, min_value, max_value FROM sbi_threshold_value WHERE threshold_id=? ORDER BY position

STATEMENT.name: DETAIL_THRESHOLD_VALUE
STATEMENT.query: SELECT id_threshold_value as id, threshold_id, severity_id, position, min_value, max_value, label, colour FROM sbi_threshold_value WHERE id_threshold_value=?

STATEMENT.name: UPDATE_THRESHOLD_VALUE
STATEMENT.query: UPDATE sbi_threshold_value SET position=?, label=?, min_value=?, max_value=?, colour=? WHERE id_threshold_value=?

STATEMENT.name: INSERT_THRESHOLD_VALUE
STATEMENT.query: INSERT INTO sbi_threshold_value(threshold_id, position, label, min_value, max_value, colour) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?);
